title: Mavs fire GM Harrison amid continued fan angst
content: The Mavericks on Tuesday fired general manager Nico Harrison, who had been under fire from fans following last season's trade of Luka Doncic to the Lakers.

title: Kelly files suit, says LSU seeking 'for cause' firing
content: In a legal filing Monday, Brian Kelly's attorneys say LSU has taken the position that it has not "formally terminated" Kelly as the Tigers' football coach and is now seeking to fire him "for cause" and potentially avoid paying his full $54 million buyout.

title: Richardson, NBA star before ban, dies at age 70
content: Four-time NBA All-Star Michael Ray Richardson, who was banned from the NBA for drug use, died at the age of 70 shortly after getting diagnosed with prostate cancer.

title: New Eagles LB Phillips 'showed out' in 10-7 win
content: A week after being traded from Miami to Philadelphia, new Eagles linebacker Jaelan Phillips played 52 snaps, racked up seven pressures, six tackles, two quarterback hits and a fumble recovery in his club's 10-7 win over the Packers on Monday night.

title: Jerry mourns Kneeland, 'was just getting started'
content: Cowboys owner and general manager Jerry Jones said he was devastated when he got the news regarding the death of Marshawn Kneeland last week.

title: NCAA settles with unpaid coaches for $303M
content: The NCAA has agreed to pay $303 million to settle a class action antitrust lawsuit representing about 7,700 volunteer college coaches who alleged the organization engaged in illegal wage fixing under a rule that prohibited schools from paying them.

title: Love: Packers offense 'letting the defense down'
content: A strong effort from the Packers defense Monday night coincided with one of the worst offensive games in Jordan Love's three seasons as the starter, prompting the QB to remark, "You feel like as an offense you're letting the defense down."

title: Pistons' Cunningham has 46 on 45 shots in OT win
content: Pistons star Cade Cunningham scored 46 points on 45 shots in a wild overtime win vs. the Wizards. His 31 misses were the most since the 1976-77 merger.

title: McDermott backs Brady; not eyeing Daboll for staff
content: Bills coach Sean McDermott said Monday he was "fully confident" in offensive coordinator Joe Brady and his staff following a blowout loss to the Dolphins in Week 10.

title: üí∞ Inside the Lakers' unbelievable $241M week
content: The Lakers' fifth-year guard now sits at the center of two major NBA storylines: Helping the team win enough to convince LeBron James to stay in L.A., but playing so well that it might cost the franchise nearly $250M dollars to keep him.

content: Let's update our NFL Power Rankings ahead of Week 11. Plus, we picked every team's MVP -- not including quarterbacks.

content: In the end, the fear of being busted is about the only universal deterrent. Prison is a powerful disincentive.

content: Duke is loaded with talent. Here are nine other teams NBA fans should be watching this college season.

content: Ferrari is underperforming in 2025, and while its drivers are sharing their frustrations, chairman John Elkann is placing the blame at their feet.

content: "Josh Allen" was up 232% for sports-inspired cat names this year, according to a recent report by pet-sitting website Rover.

title: Highlights from John Cena's farewell tour
content: Here are the best moments from John Cena's "The Last Time is Now" farewell tour, which kicked off at Intuit Dome on Jan. 6.

title: 10% More Women Than Men In Record Bihar Turnout, Exit Polls Predict NDA Win
content: Phase 2 of assembly polls in Bihar today saw the highest ever turnout, with over 67% voting till 6 pm. Voting is being held on 122 seats, from where a chunk of Chief Minister Nitish Kumar's cabinet is seeking re-election.

title: 'Students Already Christians': Official Amid Conversion Row In Gwalior School
content: An investigation by the district administration into the alleged religious conversion of children from different states of the country in St Joseph School in Madhya Pradesh's Gwalior district found the allegations to be baseless.

title: Retired Principal Arrested In Assam Over Delhi Suicide Blast Post
content: A retired school principal has been detained in Assam's Cachar district for allegedly posting a controversial comment on social media regarding the blast near Delhi's Red Fort on Monday.

title: "Her Behaviour Was Strange": Professor Recalls Terror Accused Doctor
content: Shaheen Saeed, a doctor, till recently would have passed as just another professional, going about doing her work. But no one who worked with her had the faintest idea who she really was.

title: Delhi Blast: Brother Of Doctor Arrested From Al Falah University Raided
content: Several properties were raided in Lucknow on Tuesday in connection with the recovery of explosives from Faridabad and the Delhi suicide blast, including a house that belongs to the brother of Dr Shaheen Shahid.

title: Golgappa Tussle Turns Violent: Water Spill Sparks Street Fight In Madhya Pradesh
content: What started as a simple splash of water at a gol gappa stall Madhya Pradesh's Shivpuri turned into a full-blown street fight.

title: NDA To Win, But Tejashwi Yadav Most Popular Chief Minister Face: Exit Poll
content: His party may not be coming to power in Bihar but RJD leader Tejashwi Yadav is the most popular chief ministerial face in the state, an exit poll has revealed.

title: Blast Near Red Fort Triggered By Panic, IED Was Unfinished: Sources
content: An initial assessment of the blast site near the Red Fort in Delhi indicated the suspects may have panicked and made a mistake while carrying the explosives, top intelligence sources told NDTV today.

title: 'Not Going To Compromise': Piyush Goyal Wants 'Fair' Deal With US
content: Commerce and Industry Minister Piyush Goyal on Tuesday said India wants a fair, equitable, balanced trade deal with the US and it will not compromise on the interests of farmers, fishermen, and the dairy sector.

title: Top Court Reserves Verdict On Challenge To Tribunal Reforms Law
content: The Supreme Court reserved its verdict on a batch of petitions challenging the constitutional validity of the Tribunals Reforms (Rationalisation and Conditions of Service) Act, 2021.

title: Jagan Reddy Asked To Appear Before CBI Court In Disproportionate Assets Case
content: A Special CBI Court in Hyderabad has directed former Andhra Pradesh Chief Minister Y.S. Jagan Mohan Reddy to ensure his personal appearance for the hearing in the long-pending disproportionate assets case on or before November 21.

title: 16-Year-Old, High On Marijuana, Stabs Man For Refusing To Give Him "Bidi"
content: A 16-year-old boy, reportedly high on marijuana, was apprehended for allegedly stabbing a man in east Delhi's Pandav Nagar after he refused to give him a 'bidi', police on Tuesday said.

title: Chirag Paswan Factor Could Be Here To Stay, Exit Polls Predict
content: Chirag Paswan's Lok Janshakti Party (Ram Vilas) is likely to make its presence felt this time in Bihar, exit polls have suggested.

title: Zero Seats, Big impact? Exit Polls On The Prashant Kishor Factor
content: In the lead-up to the Bihar elections, poll strategist-turned-politician Prashant Kishor kept repeating one sentence about the prospects of his Jan Suraaj Party - "arsh pe ya farsh pe", meaning it would either do really well or really badly.

title: Bihar Election Poll Of Exit Poll Results 2025 Highlights: 9 Exit Polls Predict NDA Sweep In Bihar, Poor Show By Prashant Kishor's Party

title: After Blast News, He Called His 3 Sons In Delhi. One Never Replied
content: As visuals of the deadly Delhi blast flooded social media and news channels, many called their friends and family members in the national capital to check on them

title: 763 Residents Of Rajasthan Village Boycott Anta Bypoll In Protest
content: While voters queued up at booths across Rajasthan's Anta Assembly constituency on Tuesday, a small village remained eerily silent. In Sankli, only a single vote was cast as a mark of anger and despair.

title: Bihar Election 2025 Phase 2 Voting LIVE Updates: Bihar Records Highest Turnout Of 68.76% In Phase 2
content: Voter enthusiasm continued to mark the second and final phase of the Bihar Assembly elections, with an impressive 60.40% turnout recorded across the constituencies until 3 pm.

title: Report GPS Spoofing Within 10 Minutes Of Detection: Aviation Body To Pilots
content: Any instance of GPS spoofing or abnormal satellite navigation behaviour will now have to be reported within 10 minutes of detection, the Directorate General of Civil Aviation has ordered.

title: New Video Captures Horror Moments After Delhi Suicide Blast
content: A powerful explosion near Delhi's Red Fort on Monday evening killed nine people and left 20 others injured. The blast occurred around 6:52 pm when a Hyundai i20 car exploded at a traffic stop near the Red Fort Metro Station.

title: Women outnumber men in turnout despite fewer registrations than men after SIR cuts in Bihar
content: Despite four million fewer registrations, four lakh more women turned out to vote in Bihar‚Äôs Assembly elections

title: Nine exit polls project decisive majority for NDA in Bihar
content: Matrize has given 147-167 seats to NDA, 70-90 to Mahagatbandhan (MGB), 0-2 to Jan Suraaj Party (JSP) and 2-8 seats to others, while People‚Äôs Insight has predicted 133-148 seats for NDA, 87-102 to MGB, 0-2 to JSP, and 3-6 seats to others

title: Supreme Court raps Uttarakhand High Court for staying prosecution of former Director of Corbett Tiger Reserve over illegal tree-felling
content: Earlier, the Bench had directed the Indian Forest Service officer to appear before it on November 11 to explain why contempt proceedings should not be initiated against him for moving the High Court despite being aware that the matter was pending before the Supreme Court

content: The architecture refers to the ‚Äòcommon but differentiated responsibilities‚Äô, which means that countries must do their bit to curb fossil fuel emissions without compromising on national priorities; India says the parties ‚Äúmust remain committed to and guided by equity‚Äù

content: 11 ghats will be developed along the river Godavari for Godavari Pushkarams-2027 in Kakinada district.

content: The AAP said that sympathy over social media has no value if the government cannot even provide ambulances for families to take the dead bodies home

content: Justice Narasimha made these oral observations while hearing a petition on the conservation of the dying species of the Great Indian Bustard, which is being bred in captivity, and the Lesser Florican

content: The party‚Äôs joint general secretary C.T.R. Nirmal Kumar submits a list of preferred symbols to the ECI in New Delhi.

content: CPI(M) State secretary says various issues, including Sabarimala, will be topics of discussion during local body polls and the LDF government has nothing to hide

content: Deputy Chief Minister says the proposed board will protect temples, promote Sanatana values, and ensure respect for Hindu faith in a secular democracy

content: The Special Intensive Revision of the electoral rolls in Tamil Nadu has opened a debate among members of the public on why such an exercise is being carried out by the Election Commission, says the TNCC chief

title: INCOIS targets faster tsunami alerts using GNSS sensors, AI models
content: Scientists working to enhance early warning systems for tsunamis originating from Sumatra-Andaman subduction zone, aiming to reduce the warning time to less than five minutes

title: SCR launches QR-based ID system for outsourced staff, reviews winter safety preparedness
content: The platform ensures secure, efficient processing with features such as role-based access, OTP-based login, document uploads and a two-level verification and approval workflow before ID issuance.

title: Elevated walkway planned to connect Bengaluru airport metro station with KIA Terminal 1
content: KIA, one of India‚Äôs fastest-growing airports, is currently handling more than 37 million passengers annually and aims to reach over 60 million passengers per year within the next five years, according to officials

content: In an official communiqu√©, the Medical Superintendent of GMC, Anantnag, directed all heads of departments ‚Äúto identify lockers and almirahs in their respective departments and wards and to label them with the names of the staff members to whom they are allotted‚Äù

content: It is important to conduct public awareness programmes to inform citizens about the department‚Äôs initiatives0

content: Rashid, who is at the Tihar Jail, in Delhi, has decided to go on a two-day hunger strike against the attack from November 12, according to his party

content: As the odds shift for the Heisman Trophy race, Pamela Maldonado explains how to bet it heading into Week 12.

content: Could Liverpool end up signing Yankuba Minteh from Brighton & Hove Albion? Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

content: Nabi, the main suspect, was a ‚Äòreligious person and passionate cricketer‚Äô, who laid emphasis on higher studies, says family member

title: Heavy rain likely to occur in isolated places in southern districts of T.N. on Wednesday
content: Light to moderate rain is likely to occur at a few places over south Tamil Nadu and at isolated places over north Tamil Nadu, Puducherry, and Karaikal.

title: KSRTC to offer complimentary Nandini snack kits on Flybus services
content: Transport Minister Ramalinga Reddy will launch the new service at Terminal 2 of Kempegowda International Airport.

title: The Hindu Group‚Äôs Frontline launches collection of essays by Constitutional expert A.G. Noorani
content: The first few copies of the book were presented to Justice K. Chandru and Justice Prabha Sridevan, former judges of the Madras High Court, by N. Ram, Director, The Hindu Group Publishing Private Limited

title: Ministers review arrangements for Sri Sathya Sai Baba‚Äôs centenary celebrations in Puttaparthi
content: Group of Ministers led by Anagani Satyaprasad directs officials to ensure smooth conduct of week-long celebrations, with focus on traffic, sanitation, and medical facilities for devotees

title: Naidu urged to allocate land in MSME Park for bulk drug units
content: Bulk Drug Manufacturers Association of India seeks 1,000 acres of land in the newly inaugurated MSME Park in Prakasam district

title: Six Maoists killed in Bijapur encounter
content: Automatic weapons, Sten guns, .303 rifles, and explosives have been recovered from the encounter site; Chief Minister hails operation as ‚Äúanother decisive step‚Äù to eliminate Maoism

title: Protest against seaplane project held in Kochi
content: Fisherfolk allege that the seaplane initiative will affect the livelihoods of local fishers in Kochi and other identified areas

title: Centre sanctions ‚Çπ358.82 crore for rural roads and bridges in Andhra Pradesh under PM-JANMAN
content: Union Minister Shivraj Singh Chouhan announces projects to boost connectivity and access to services in tribal regions; tendering to be completed within a week, works targeted for completion by 2025‚Äì26

title: Ex-forest officer‚Äôs book sheds light on Kerala‚Äôs dark underbelly of wildlife trade and superstitions
content: The author shares real-life undercover operations conducted by the Forest department to curb the illegal trade in tiger skins and other wildlife products

title: Water supply being restored, claims KWA a day after storage tank collapse in Kochi
content: Repair work was carried out on a war footing to avert water scarcity, and pumping began from the second chamber of the water storage tank, says Minister

title: BJP counters YSRCP‚Äôs ‚Äòprivatisation‚Äô charge, defends PPP model
content: Yamini says the PPP model is being misrepresented by YSRCP; clarifies that hospitals and services remain under government control, ensuring free and quality healthcare for the poor

title: Centre working to create 10 crore ‚ÄòLakhpati Didis‚Äô, says Shivraj Singh Chouhan
content: Says the Centre and the Andhra Pradesh government are jointly implementing programmes to strengthen rural livelihoods through watershed development, sustainable agriculture, and women-centric initiatives

title: CPI(M) slams Visakha summit agenda, demands all-party meet on voters‚Äô list revision
content: Party‚Äôs State Secretariat passes resolutions on SIR process, cyclone relief, tenant farmers‚Äô compensation, and withdrawal of power and medical college privatisation plans

title: Police urge Sabarimala devotees to follow virtual queue, safety guidelines
content: Police warn that unregulated arrivals can disrupt crowd management, affect the smooth flow of devotees, and create safety concerns. Pilgrims therefore should secure a  virtual queue slot before starting their journey

title: Veligonda project will turn drought-prone areas of Prakasam district to fertile lands: CM
content: Assures to complete the project by 2026 and provide water to Kanigiri, Yerragondapalem, Giddalur and Markapuram areas

title: Chief Secretary directs DISCOMs to expedite solar rooftop programme
content: Vijayanand says Andhra Pradesh is committed to clean, affordable energy; Kuppam Constituency to be developed as 100% solar and Net Zero with ADB, NABARD support

title: Karnataka ranks fourth in the country for adoptions
content: Despite growing interest, State faces shortage of adoptable children; 2,271 parents await while only 79 children are available

title: NCD-4 survey shows better cancer screening outcomes in Andhra Pradesh
content: Over 22,000 women identified for further tests as Health Department ramps up screening and awareness efforts, says Health Minister

title: 'Predictable tactic': India calls out Pak PM, says Islamabad remark made to deflect internal power grab
content: India has strongly refuted Pakistan's claims linking New Delhi to a suicide bombing near Islamabad, labeling the accusations "baseless and unfounded." The Ministry of External Affairs stated that Pakistan's allegations are a diversionary tactic to distract from its internal political and constitutional turmoil, a move the international community will not be misled by.

title: Delhi blast: Car was moving, no crater; key reasons agencies think attackers panicked
content: Initial investigations into a car explosion near Delhi's Red Fort suggest it was not a typical suicide attack, but possibly a premature detonation by a panicked suspect. The blast, which killed at least eight people, did not exhibit the usual modus operandi of suicide bombers, with no crater or shrapnel found.

title: US govt shutdown: Dems break rank; is Trump about to get his way?
content: Liberal Democrats are reportedly revolting against party leadership, accusing them of surrendering to President Trump on government reopening without securing healthcare subsidy extensions.  This internal dissent follows a new bill to end the shutdown, supported by centrist Democrats, heading to the House.  Activists and some lawmakers are demanding leadership changes, citing a betrayal of their mandate.

title: 1st Test: From Gill to Bumrah - who did what during first Kolkata practice session?
content: Shubman Gill spent nearly 90 minutes in the nets as he adjusted back to red-ball cricket after recent white-ball games. Before batting, head coach Gautam Gambhir and assistant coach Sitanshu Kotak spoke with him near the High Court end, news agency PTI reported. Among the fast bowlers, only Jasprit Bumrah bowled.

title: Bihar poll of exit polls: NDA to roar back to power with 148 seats; what pollsters said
content: Exit polls indicate a strong win for the NDA in the Bihar elections. The alliance is expected to secure a majority of seats. The RJD-led Mahagathbandhan is projected to fall short. High voter turnout was recorded in both phases of the polling. The results will shape the political landscape of Bihar.

title: Vibe coding: Meta‚Äôs AI chief has advice for teens: Says they should spend time on..
content: Meta's Chief AI Officer, Alexandr Wang, urges teenagers to master AI tools, comparing the current era to the dawn of personal computing. He advises dedicating thousands of hours to 'vibe-coding'‚Äîhands-on experimentation with AI‚Äîto gain a significant advantage in the future economy. This approach emphasizes rapid learning through prompting and refining AI outputs.

title: Rs 23.75cr too high': KKR questioned for Venkatesh Iyer decision
content: Former Australian captain Aaron Finch advises Kolkata Knight Riders to reconsider Venkatesh Iyer's hefty Rs 23.75 crore retention. Finch believes Iyer's current middle-order role, without bowling, doesn't justify the price, despite past match-winning performances. He suggests releasing Iyer to free up funds and potentially reacquiring him at a more balanced cost.

title: Caught in doping! India's Asiad medalist slapped with five-year ban
content: Incheon Asian Games medallist Manju Bala faces a five-year ban for doping violations, testing positive for steroids and SARMS.  Several other athletes, including Mohan Saini, bodybuilders, a boxer, a canoeist, and a basketball player, have also received suspensions ranging from two to six years.  A sprinter's four-year ban was also upheld.

title: Chinese Cryptoqueen caught: UK police seize Bitcoin; scam worth billion exposed
content: A Chinese woman has received an 11-year sentence in the UK for laundering millions embezzled from pensioners. Qian Zhimin, who fled China, used a fake passport to enter the UK and lived lavishly. Police seized one of the world's largest crypto hauls, with the Bitcoin's value soaring significantly since its discovery.

title: Knicks mourn the passing of former star Micheal Ray Richardson
content: Former basketball star Micheal Ray Richardson has died. He played for the Knicks and Nets and was a four-time NBA All-Star. Richardson's career included overcoming substance abuse issues and coaching overseas. Tributes from the Knicks and his attorney praise his defensive skills and character. Isiah Thomas also spoke highly of his playing ability.

title: Naroditsky‚Äôs tragic death: FIDE files formal complaint against Kramnik
content: FIDE has filed a formal complaint against former World Champion Vladimir Kramnik with its Ethics & Disciplinary Commission. The complaint addresses Kramnik's repeated public accusations of cheating against deceased GM Daniel Naroditsky and GM David Navara, citing harassment and insult to dignity. The EDC will now review the evidence and testimony.

title: ‚ÄòDon‚Äôt have notifications‚Äô: JPMorgan chief ignores most texts; keeps phone off at work
content: JPMorgan Chase CEO Jamie Dimon, despite leading a massive bank, limits his phone use at work, turning off notifications and ignoring texts unless from his children. He prioritizes focus in meetings, believing distractions hinder engagement. Dimon also advocates for US schools to evolve, integrating crucial skills like coding and cybersecurity to prepare students for the modern workforce.

title: Bihar exit polls: Pollsters predict landslide for NDA - but how accurate were they last time
content: Exit polls for Bihar's assembly elections suggest the ruling NDA is poised to retain power, with the opposition Mahagathbandhan falling short of a majority. Prashant Kishor's Jan Suraaj is not expected to secure any seats. Despite high voter turnout, historical trends show exit polls have often misjudged Bihar's electoral outcomes.

title: Are you still randomly applying to jobs? Alan Stein's networking strategy that actually works
content: In today‚Äôs crowded job market, sending endless applications often yields little result. Career expert Alan Stein advocates prioritizing networking over applying, introducing his ‚ÄúFive Chats Rule‚Äù‚Äîhaving five meaningful conversations weekly with professionals in target companies. These interactions build trust, uncover hidden opportunities, and give job-seekers a human edge, turning curiosity and connections into career growth.

title: Bihar exit polls show NDA sweep: JD(U) says 'stamp' on Nitish govt; 'not accurate', says Cong
content: Exit polls predict a sweeping victory for the NDA in Bihar, with leaders celebrating the predicted outcome. Conversely, Mahagathbandhan leaders dismissed the polls as speculative, expressing confidence in their own victory. The counting of votes is scheduled for Friday.

title: Michael Willis Heard death: How TikTok star Yes King died
content: TikTok sensation Michael Willis Heard, known as 'Yes King,' has passed away. His daughter confirmed the news, remembering him for his uplifting videos promoting self-love and confidence. The Elyria, Ohio native, who also served as a life coach and pastor-like figure, inspired millions with his positive energy. His sudden departure has deeply saddened his global fanbase.

title: Taylor Swift & Travis Kelce urged to elevate fashion at Michelin-star NYC spot
content: Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce navigated The Polo Bar's strict dress code for their recent Manhattan dinner.  The celebrity couple, known for their impeccable style, ensured their outfits adhered to the smart and elegant attire policy.  Sources revealed they appeared nervous about complying, highlighting the restaurant's commitment to treating all guests equally, regardless of fame.

title: Is Stephen Curry playing tonight vs OKC? Warriors star‚Äôs status revealed
content: Warriors fans are holding their breath as Stephen Curry's return from illness remains uncertain ahead of the Oklahoma City Thunder clash. The 37-year-old's lingering cold has sidelined him for three consecutive games, impacting the team's performance. His presence is crucial for the struggling Warriors, currently at an even 5-5 record, as they face a tough schedule.

title: 'Hunt down each & every culprit': Amit Shah says Delhi blast culprits to face 'full wrath of agencies'
content: Union Home Minister Amit Shah has ordered a relentless pursuit to apprehend all individuals involved in the devastating i20 car blast near the Red Fort. The high-intensity explosion claimed at least 12 lives and injured 30, with Prime Minister Narendra Modi and Defence Minister Rajnath Singh vowing that perpetrators will face severe justice.

title: Turkish military plane with 20 aboard catches fire mid-air, crashes in Georgia - watch
content: A Turkish military cargo plane crashed in Georgia Tuesday. The C-130 aircraft was carrying 20 people. It took off from Azerbaijan and was returning to Turkey. The crash happened near the Azerbaijani border. Search and rescue operations are underway. Leaders from Turkey and Azerbaijan expressed deep sadness and offered condolences.

title: IRCTC hotel corruption case: Court rejects Lalu, Rabri plea for 1-week gap in hearings
content: A Delhi court dismissed Lalu Prasad Yadav and Rabri Devi's plea for a one-week gap between hearings in the IRCTC Hotels corruption case. The court cited High Court directions for day-to-day listing until witness examination concludes. The case involves alleged corruption in hotel tender awards during Yadav's tenure as railway minister.

title: Happy Children‚Äôs Day 2025: 50 best wishes, messages & quotes to share with loved ones
content: Children's Day, celebrated annually on November 14th, honors the joy, curiosity, and love children bring. This year, in 2025, the occasion serves as a reminder to cherish childhood and nurture young dreams. The article offers heartfelt wishes and messages to celebrate every child's uniqueness and the special spirit of this day.

title: Red Fort blast: Shubman Gill reacts: 'Disturbed by the distressing events'
content: Shubman Gill expressed deep sorrow following a tragic car explosion near Delhi's Red Fort that claimed 12 lives.  The incident has prompted heightened security in Kolkata ahead of India's Test series against South Africa. The government has entrusted the National Investigation Agency with probing the blast, signaling a potential terror angle.

title: Rizwan's Pakistan captaincy sack: Afridi breaks silence - 'Good human'
content: Shaheen Shah Afridi revealed he accepted Pakistan's ODI captaincy after Mohammad Rizwan voluntarily stepped down. Afridi emphasized a collaborative approach, seeking advice from all, including former captains, and stressed collective team responsibility for improvement. He aims to lead Pakistan in the 2027 World Cup, backing both in-form and struggling players.

title: Bihar exit polls: NDA projected to retain power in Bihar; big boost to Nitish
content: Opinion polls released on Tuesday overwhelmingly predicted a decisive victory for the NDA in Bihar, projecting a significant majority. Conversely, exit polls indicated a setback for the Tejashwi-led Mahagathbandhan, with projections showing a considerable drop in seat share compared to the previous election. Prashant Kishor's Jan Suraaj Party also appears set for a subdued performance in its debut.

title: 'Where are the bedbugs?' Giri lashes out at Goa's criticism
content: Anish Giri has downplayed criticism of FIDE World Cup conditions in Goa, calling some claims exaggerated. While acknowledging challenges like jet lag and different food for Western players, he noted the availability of Western dishes and reasonable spice levels. Giri also humorously dismissed reports of bedbugs, suggesting they might stem from misidentification and a lack of firsthand experience.

title: U19 triangular series: Why Suryavanshi 'not considered' for selection? BCCI clarifies
content: The BCCI has announced India A U19 and India B U19 squads for an upcoming triangular series featuring Afghanistan U19. Vaibhav Suryavanshi was omitted as he is selected for the ACC Rising Stars Asia Cup, while Ayush Mhatre is unavailable due to Ranji Trophy participation. The tri series begins on November 17 in Bengaluru.

title: Canada‚Äôs immigration plan: 50% cut in international student intake; fallout looms
content: Canada will admit fewer temporary residents, including international students, over the next three years. This move aims to bring migration rates to sustainable levels. The number of study permits will be cut by about 50%. This will impact universities and colleges financially. They will need to adjust recruitment and domestic enrollment strategies.

title: US Senate votes to end longest-ever shutdown - what now?
content: President Donald Trump has already endorsed the deal, calling it ‚Äúa very good package‚Äù and promising to ‚Äúopen up the country very quickly.‚ÄùThe House, which has been on recess since mid-September, will reconvene Wednesday to vote on the measure.

title: Delhi blast: UP doc was tasked with forming Jaish's women wing; Pulwama link emerges
content: A woman doctor, Dr. Shaheen Sayeed, is a key suspect in a terror investigation involving a "white-collar" network. The probe intensified after a deadly car blast near Delhi's Red Fort, linked to the Pakistan-based Jaish-e-Mohammed. Eight individuals, including three doctors, were arrested with significant explosives seized.

title: Belichick‚Äôs daughter-in-law appears to snub Jordon Hudson during UNC win
content: Tension simmered at a North Carolina football game as Bill Belichick's girlfriend, Jordon Hudson, and daughter-in-law, Jennifer Schmitt, reportedly kept their distance. This follows a public online spat, with Hudson's necklace seemingly referencing a rumored ban from team facilities. Despite the Tar Heels' wins, off-field family drama continues to draw attention.

title: Delhi blast: With three occupants in i20 car, does it rule out a fidayeen attack?
content: Security agencies are probing a Red Fort blast, questioning if a fidayeen attack is plausible with three occupants in the car. Initial theories pointed to a suicide mission, but multiple individuals and CCTV footage suggest otherwise. Investigators are exploring accidental detonation or a botched transport of explosives to another target.

title: Hilarious! From Anand to Giri, chess stars get Candidates venue wrong ‚Äî Watch
content: Cyprus will host the 2026 FIDE Candidates and Women's Candidates tournaments. The events are scheduled for March 28 to April 16, 2026, near Paphos. Several players have already qualified. The FIDE World Cup in Goa will determine three more Candidates spots. India's R Praggnanandhaa is expected to top the 2025 FIDE Circuit.

title: New season, old Delhi: Sr selector lands in US mid-season
content: Delhi cricket is in crisis mode ‚Äî on-field failures mirror the chaos off it. With the DDCA mired in infighting, unauthorised league scandals, and selection controversies, Delhi‚Äôs Ranji team has slumped to a new low as they were hammered by Jammu & Kashmir at home in the Ranji Trophy. Poor preparation, lack of direction under coach Sarandeep Singh, and internal politics has left the Delhi team in a lurch.

title: Ronaldo's retirement: Will he play FIFA WC 2026? Legend clears air
content: Football icon Cristiano Ronaldo has revealed the 2026 FIFA World Cup will likely mark his swansong, aiming to compete at 41.  Despite nearing the twilight of his career, the prolific scorer, who recently extended his contract with Al-Nassr until 2027, feels fit and sharp.  He remains focused on securing the one major trophy missing from his illustrious career.

title: Pakistan suicide blast: Car explodes near Islamabad court; 12 killed
content: A suicide blast in Islamabad's Kacheri area killed at least 12 people and injured several others on Tuesday. Authorities have sealed the site and launched an investigation, recovering body parts believed to be of the suspected bomber. The incident follows a separate explosion at the Supreme Court cafeteria, raising security concerns.

title: 'Amit Shah should resign': Oppn targets Centre over Delhi blast; BJP hits back
content: Opposition parties have fiercely criticized the Centre following a deadly car explosion near Delhi's Red Fort. Leaders demanded Home Minister Amit Shah's resignation, citing alleged intelligence failures and past terror incidents. They questioned the government's ability to ensure national security, while the BJP accused them of politicizing a tragedy and undermining investigations.

title: Patrick & Brittany Mahomes celebrate with custom ‚Äòhis and hers‚Äô fitness bands
content: Patrick and Brittany Mahomes have partnered with WHOOP, launching custom "His & Hers" fitness bands. This collaboration highlights their commitment to personal performance and wellness, extending their business ventures beyond sports and into technology. The wearable tracks key health metrics, offering scientifically-backed insights for users.

title: The Bartlett story ‚Äî a swimmer-turned-pacer; Virat Kohli's conqueror
content: Xavier Bartlett, a former champion swimmer, has made a remarkable transition to cricket, impressing in his fifth ODI by dismantling India's top order. Mentored by Andy Bichel, Bartlett's ability to swing the new ball consistently and his athletic prowess, honed in the pool, make him a bright prospect for Australian cricket across all formats.

title: Exclusive - Bigg Boss 19's Abhishek Bajaj calls cheating allegations by ex-wife 'baseless'
content: Abhishek Bajaj, recently eliminated from Bigg Boss 19, has strongly refuted cheating allegations made by his ex-wife, Akanksha Jindal. He labeled her a "social parasite and fame digger," asserting their divorce was mutual and amicable. Bajaj emphasized his loyalty in relationships and friendships, urging viewers to judge him by his actions within the house.

title: Delhi blast: First lead to terror plot came from Jaish posters in J&K; attack in works for 2 yrs?
content: Bharti Jain is senior editor with The Times of India, New Delhi. She has been writing on security matters since 1996. Having covered the Union home ministry, security agencies, Election Commission and the ‚Äòprime‚Äô political beat, the Congress, for The Economic Times all these years, she moved to TOI in August 2012. Her repertoire of news stories delves into the whole gamut of issues related to terrorism and internal strife, besides probing strategic affairs in India‚Äôs neighbourhood. Read More

title: How to watch ESPN amid Disney-YouTube TV blackout
content: the blackout affects ABC, the ESPN networks, the Disney-branded channels, Freeform, the FX networks and the Xfinity network . the conflict affects the channel's ability to carry Disney programming . if you don't have cable access, you can get instant access to ESPN content through a variety of services including Cox, Dish, DirecTV, Fios, Fubo, Hulu + Live TV, Mediacom, Optimum, Sling, Spectrum TV and

title: Winners and losers: Taylor, Henderson shine; Jefferson, Darnold struggle
content: RB, Indianapolis colts : Jonathan Taylor scored 49.6 fantasy points . he tied for 36th on the all-time single-game list . the rushing score in the fourth quarter rallied his team from behind .

title: Are Chelsea meeting expectations? 9 stats that explain their confusing season
content: Est√™vo came off the bench to help Chelsea beat Wolverhampton 3-0 . a question that should be easier to answer than it is: Are Chelsea succeeding? for most teams, it's close to black and white . sunderland have all but clinched another year in the top flight .

title: Breaking down each team's City Edition uniform
content: the 2025-26 season marks the ninth campaign of the collaboration between the Nike and the NBA on the uniforms . this year's theme is all about "remixing" previous designs . the "Cream City" threads are back for the San Antonio Spurs and the "California Dream" for the Los Angeles Lakers .

title: Projecting the CFP top 12: Who's No. 2?
content: the selection committee will reveal its second of six rankings on Tuesday night . it will be the first loss of the season to be no. 2 on Tuesday . a deeper dive into the statistics and r√©sum√©s of both undefeated teams will factor into their discussions .

title: A drawn knife, an escape by train, a decorated military figure and Georgia Tech's first win
content: the first lieutenant, 33, arrived on horseback to the campus in the fall of 1893 . he registered as a "sub-apprentice" in a woodworking course so he could qualify . any aspirations of becoming a master craftsman, though, were secondary .

title: What's next for Daboll? A split in the 2024 QB class? Solak's second look at Week 10
content: the Giants fired coach Brian Daboll after 61 games at the helm . daboll's Giants are 2-8 for the third consecutive season and end 20-40-1 under his tenure . the most interesting headline to come out of the firing is that general manager Joe Schoen is keeping his job . every Tuesday, I'll spin the previous week of NFL action forward .

title: Passan's perfect move for 21 MLB teams that could go big this offseason
content: a deluge of moves is coming between now and the new year . there are caveats: at least one team on this list will sign multiple players . some players who could be on here are a stretch because of budgets .

title: Bobby Marks' NBA Contract Year All-Stars: Reaves, Lakers lead 12-man lineup
content: the 2025-26 season is just three weeks old, and there are more than six months until the start of free agency . the court should not dissuade us from identifying 12 potential free agents who have stood out and what their future could hold with their respective teams . there are criteria to how we selected our lineup of contract-year All-Stars .

title: CFP Bubble Watch: Who's in? Who's out? Who's close ahead of the second ranking?
content: the college football playoff selection committee will have three main questions to answer . the answer will impact teams ranked 9-12 . teams labeled Still in the mix haven't been eliminated, but have work to do .

title: Awards Week predictions, results: Kurtz, Baldwin named Rookies of the Year
content: the most prestigious awards are the four major honors determined by BBWAA voting . the awards will have a lasting impact on baseball history books and Hall of Fame r√©sum√©s . baseball will also hold its annual awards show in Las Vegas on Thursday .
